00154     double getMaxSpeed() const {
00155         return myMaxSpeed;
00156     }
00157 
00161     double hasSpeedDeviation() const {
00162         return mySpeedDev != 0.0 || mySpeedFactor != 1.0;
00163     }
00164 
00171     double getMaxSpeedWithDeviation(double referenceSpeed) const {
00172         SUMOReal meanSpeed = mySpeedFactor * referenceSpeed;
00173         SUMOReal speedDev = mySpeedDev * meanSpeed;
00174         SUMOReal speed = MIN3(RandHelper::randNorm(meanSpeed, speedDev),
00175                 meanSpeed + 2 * speedDev, myMaxSpeed);
00176         return MAX3((SUMOReal) 0.0, speed, meanSpeed - 2 * speedDev);
00177     }
00178 
00182     double getDefaultProbability() const {

00184     }
